website_summaries.verdict: A quality lip balm that's affordable and something your guests will really use.
pros: Pack of 16 natural lip balms come in a variety of flavors including peppermint, pomegranate, vanilla, mango, and green tea
Cruelty-free and made from safe, natural ingredients
Quality lip balms will protect your guests lips all year round
Set sits at a low price point
cons: Lip balm labels may not fit in with themed parties
However, you can easily add your own

customer_reviews.title: Best Chapstick
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the 32 variety pack of this chapstick. As an extreme chapstick user, I always have at least 3 on me. I was a bit skeptical of this at first but when I received it , this has been the only chapstick I've been using. Far better than EOS, Chapstick brand, soft lips, carmex, and any other brand I've ever used. Nice subtle smell of the flavor & lasts a long time with just one application. I'd recommend this to anyone. Plus it's 100% natural so that's an added bonus! I will definitely be buying again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them they have awesome scents and flavors!!! I got them for my mom for Christmas but I also kept 20 of them I will definitely buy more soon. They will make great gifts!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddog

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing and perfect for me very sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as described. I have very sensitive lips and most lip products make my lips peel constantly. I'm allergic to petroleum, parabens and the like. I've only tried the pomegranate passion flavor so far. Taste and smell are very subtle. The product goes on very thin and last long. Very hydrating and I haven't experienced any peeling or negative reaction.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: As a chapstick addict, I buy and try tons of products while this is cute and the flavors tasted great it lacked moisturizing properties that i really look for. The peppermint was my favorite! Applied on cool and smelled divine.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Monasterio

customer_reviews.title: Confessions of a chap stick addict.
customer_reviews.text: Best natural product in bulk quantity and good price I've found!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: These are so good! I have really sensitive skin so some lip ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! I have really sensitive skin so some lip balms end up making my lips crack more, but these keep my lips soft without leaving them sticky at all. I reapply way less compare to other brands that I've used in the past so I love that! The different types it comes with all smell so good too, that pomegranate one is on point! Plus the packaging is adorable and I love the little carrier it brings. Great price, happy lips!
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting silky smooth lips!
customer_reviews.text: Naturistick is all natural and lasts longer than my old favorite "Carmex". I am a lip balm addict and I now have a new favorite-Naturistick Pepermint lip balm. It lasts much longer than any I have tried before and doesnt make your lips feel dry when it wears off, like some other brands can do, leading to a constant cycle of reapplication. I use it about 3 to 4 times a day and Im good! I got the 7 pack and gave some to a few close friends, they agree with my comments and are also finished hunting for the perfect lip balm. Naturistick is the winner!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Not sold on these.
customer_reviews.text: The value for these chapsticks are great. However; the effects haven't impressed me. Before buying these, I only used Burt's Bees (with Vitamin E & Peppermint). Comparing the two, the Burt's Bees is superior in my experience. This chapstick goes on smooth, but it does not moisturize well. It ends up feeling more like a "layer" of chapstick on my lips, instead of it absorbing into my lips. I find myself having to apply this more often than BBs as well. I appreciate the ingredients in the product, but it wont be enough to make me purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chapstick that actually moisturizes!
customer_reviews.text: Before I found and purchased this chapstick by Naturstick I was on the hunt for a beeswax based chapstick that didn't just sit on my lips and require constant reapplication. One of my favorite chapsticks is the Vit E and Peppermint Burt's Bees and Naturstick is surprisingly comparable - in texture, scent and feel. It has all the goods of Burt's Bees without the price. This chapstick actually moisturizes your lips instead of annoyingly just sitting on top. There is a peppermint scent and it leaves that fun minty tingle as well. Would definitely recommend and plan to repurchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We all hate chapped lips and we try to avoid synthetic fragrances, but I like things to smell good and WORK for a reasonable price - and THIS fits the bill! My 6 year old loves them, too and even took one as soon as it came in and he tried it. I've been using it for a few weeks and am very happy. Will be re-ordering when we run out! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Best lip product for stubborn lips!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! Only the first day of use and my lips peeled from the hard gross skin from my lips and have the underneath all smooth and nice! Rarely ever does lip balms help my lips, I’ve tried so many brands to still have my lips look crusty and cracked. Absolutely love this product and WILL buy again! The scents are wonderful but don’t mess with my allergies and there is practically no taste which I really enjoy! And it glides on and feels very nice and not caked or slimy like other brands. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pledger

customer_reviews.title: No more Beeswax chapstick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 different brands of chap stick to see which one I will continue using and this was the worst. Barely can tell it's peppermint and it does not make your lips smooth, its like putting pure wax on your lips, feels sticky and uncomfortable. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: AA= AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Love love!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with the this lip balm! I usually use Burt’s bees but after reading reviews on it on what’s it’s made of I decided to try a more natural lip balm and this is it! My were always left dry even after applying Burt’s bees and one application of this they’re smooth for hours and hours! I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the packaging, and the thank you card in it. I also love the fact that this is eco friendly, and supports a small business. Of course I had to open up each scent and smell it. I was a little disappointed by the vanilla and the green tea having next to no scent, but the mango absolutely made up for it! I just put in on and can already feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, I was interested in buying a bulk ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, I was interested in buying a bulk of lip balm made with beeswax, and it was for some reason harder for me to choose burts bees because the flavors weren't the same price. I decided to give this a try and this works really well, don't have to apply too much. Even my husband likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect stocking stuffer for my husband plus I kept a few for myself! So far this product is perfect. I love the variety and the little clip to hold the balm on a keychain which is great so my husband wont loose another stick! For me with sensitivity to chemicals that attacks my skin in terrible red blotches and bumps this product has not caused any reaction thus far. It also goes on smooth and smells wonderful. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle McDow

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly some of the worst lip balms I have ever tried, and as a lip balm addict I've tried A LOT. They don't make lips feel moisturized, they just feel like they are coated in a layer of heavy, gummy wax. The scents are also overpowering and super artificial, as are the flavors. It's confusing, because the ingredients are all the right things for a great lip balm, they just somehow completely missed the mark. There are some really amazing low cost lip balms out there, but in this case the low cost is low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This chapstick has a gritty feel and doesn't provide any relief for chapped lips. I am on Accutane and was looking for some relief for severe dry lips. This purchase was a waste of money. Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Heather L Tucker

customer_reviews.title: it's so good. It glides on so smooth and my lips ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried the green tea one so far and wow, it's so good. It glides on so smooth and my lips stay moisturized for about 6 hours until I have to reapply. That's a lot longer than my previous lip balms that would disappear off my lips after 30 minutes. Buy this, it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lip balms
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She's 8. She has an obsession with lip care items. Since there were 8 total, but only 4 flavors, 2 of each, she gave me 1 of each. Then took back the pomegranate one because it smelled the best. They do a good job of keeping lips hydrated, without causing that weird white build up line that I get sometimes with lip products. The scents are ok, very natural and almost no flavor. All in all, they are nice lip balms and I would recommend to a friend and also wouldn't hesitate to order again.
customer_reviews.author: lorrainey0109

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: This product has a definite peppermint feel. What I enjoy the most is its long lasting moisture. Unlike others that feel missing shortly after being applied, this product leaves lips feeling soft and moisturized. I am glad it's natural without fillers. (I don't typically leave reviews, but I'm glad I took a chance on this lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Justy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for stocking stuffers and of course I kept a couple! They smell great, go one so smooth and no funny taste to them. I also have noticed I use it once and not really again because my lips stay so moistened! I love the mint one the most so far 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lynzie S

customer_reviews.title: Good chapstick to save yourself during the winter!
customer_reviews.text: So far i’ve tried the green tea and peppermint one. Green tea one smells nice, and the scent isn’t overpowering and goes away after a couple seconds and it’s fine, moisturizing chapstick. The peppermint one is my favorite thing ever. I didn’t think i’d like it because i don’t really love a strong mint scent but the scent is lovely, again not too strong, and it gives an amazing subtle menthol tingle on your mouth. I’ve recently gotten into the [bad] habit of picking at my lips but the slight sensation the peppermint one gives is really satisfying and makes it so i leave my mouth alone. Also nicely moisturizing. My mouth feels better than it has since winter started!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Stocking stuffers for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: Stocking stuffers for my kids. I was looking for something all natural that my kids would use and I was comfortable giving to them and this is it!!! They like them and that makes me happy knowing there is no added chemicals! Thanks Naturistick!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great chap stick!
customer_reviews.text: Great consistency. Not too hard and not too creamy. I’m a runner and it provides great dryness protection in winter. Application is nice and smooth so my lips “feel” moisturized without a glossy or oily look. And all the varieties smell fantastic. I received the 8-pack as a gift and the scents or flavors are natural and subtle: Peppermint Frost, Pomegranate Passion, Green Tea Essence, Vanilla Luxury. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: NmTrekker

customer_reviews.title: Natural and Cruelty free!
customer_reviews.text: I like buying from a small business, it feels good to support companies who go the extra mile. Natural products and they do not test on animals, I like it a lot and I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Albert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Moisturizing! Affordable and more bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these lip balms. My lips had been so chapped and I drink Al or of water but I sleep with a fan at night so it sometimes dries out my lips anyway. I tried the eos brand and it felt like it was doing nothing (except low-key felt like it was drying them out more) and gone in .02 seconds lol. I was looking for something all natural and moisturizing and these were perfect. Love that I get two of each scent and honestly love the price especially with how many lip balms you're getting!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K

customer_reviews.title: Lip Licking Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the very few reviews where I don't have any negative thoughts about them, this product is really good I enjoy it it's all natural I'm not sure about all organic, but just to be honest with people nothing can be all organic or all-natural it's not possible especially in this day and age. But with that a sign this is a very good product and I do expect to be reordering soon my favorite flavors is the green tea and peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: ShugarCubez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CHAPSTICK!
customer_reviews.text: This product is like, incredibly awesome! When I first tried the chapstick (my favorite is the mint one), I was amazed by how long it lasted on my lips! Like I literally didn’t need to re-apply at all! I work 16 hours a day and I really don’t need to re-apply this chapstick unless I’m eating! The scents are great! They smell good and if you’re not into tasting the how the chapstick tastes, this chapstick is literally for you. It’s a great product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathleena Yang

customer_reviews.title: Love this product -look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I am always excited to try new lip products and was happy to see that it was 100% natural and made in the states. I have tried all the popular lip balms and have to say that this one is the best! The smell is subtle and pleasant. lips are moisturized without feeling sticky. Best of all, my lips look healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So pleasantly surprised at how much I liked these. For the price, I wasn't expecting very much, but I love the scent and feel of the pomegranate and vanilla flavors! They are definitely not like my more pricey holy grail lip balm, but these are nice to have laying around in the bathroom, in the kitchen, etc. I have lip balm everywhere because I can't stand it when my lips are dry at any given instance.
customer_reviews.author: Stang

customer_reviews.title: A good natural alternative
customer_reviews.text: These lip balms have none of the petroleum or other products I don't want near my face. With sufficient application, they moisturize well, they have an attractive scent, and they taste delicious. I'm glad to have an affordable natural lip balm. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding lip balm
customer_reviews.text: Okay, what do I know about lip balm? Nothing...except I get to kiss the lips of my sweetheart and she loves this product. I gave it to her at Christmas and she uses it every day. The scents and flavors are very nice and it does smooth the lips nicely. She says it is the best lip balm she has had, better than the bee stuff she usually buys. And it's all organic too. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the silky feel of it going on, it provides a barrier without feeling waxy, to greasy. Smells amazing and tastes good too. In a pinch I've also used it on my daughters dry cheeks when out in the snow, worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: laura sue androy

customer_reviews.title: Not so much....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these but the more I used them the more chapped my lips became. I stopped using and my lips healed. Maybe Im just sensitive to the ingredients, they seem to work well for other reviewers, but sadly they didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lip balm, awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: This works—moisturizes, lasts up to 4 hours, protects against this winter weather, and it’s all natural. Unbelievably, this is WAY LESS EXPENSIVE AND WAY MORE EFFECTIVE than anything else out there, even the cheap drugstore stuff. I bought a 16-pack, and keep the rest in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: HNR

customer_reviews.title: Great lip balm, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these packs for our child to give as Christmas gifts for her teachers. I did a lot of research on 'bulk' lip balms that were both cost efficient and had good quality. These balms took the cake. I kept the left overs for myself and I use them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Trav

customer_reviews.title: Superb! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip balm!!! And I am very picky about my lip balm. 😉 Non-greasy. Soothing. Long-lasting. Just the right amount of flavor. 👍 I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Greenway-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Chapstick for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is good chapstick that works much better than burt's bees and is much cheaper! I have gotten the variety pack several times and my wife doesn't like the green tea or vanilla, but I don't mind those. I see now they sell individual flavors in packs, so I'll be getting one of those next time!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product, just what I was looking for! Nice peppermint smell and nice texture. I recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I stumbled upon this chapstick! I’m very picky and only like mint, and this one is perfect. It lasts while wearing and is minty without being overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, I am using the pomegranate one now and gave my niece the mango (which she was so excited about). They coat your lips nicely and have natural scents. My boyfriend also likes them, so they are unisex. I would certainly buy these again, especially as gifts, like stocking stuffers or something along those lines.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Watson

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE, LIGHT FLAVOR (MINT) NATURAL
customer_reviews.text: I just bought some of these, they are very good, light minty flavor. All natural. I had a different brand and they started making my lips break out (turns out to be petroleum, which is not good). I got rid of those now I buy only the organic natural items. They work well give a good medium moisture on my lips. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: BEST LIP BALM
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact these lip balms are all natural and smell great. My daughters and I really like them and they do not rub off after eating and drinking. It keeps our lips moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: T boyee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, super smooth and yummy!
customer_reviews.text: So smooth and yummy! I can't believe how inexpensive these are. SO worth the money. I'll definitely order again when I inevitably lose them. The accompanying note saying "You're the best. Thanks for supporting our small family business" and "Hand packed by Soph" (with a signature) made me smile but also feel a little guilty since these were so affordable. How do they make a profit?
customer_reviews.author: Laney7

customer_reviews.title: Great lip balm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love these lip balms. They're all so great party gifts. I also give them to my acupuncture clients. The flavor is great and stay are moisturizing without being too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I had dry lips the day these arrived and applied one and they instantly were soft and the dead skin fell off so there's that. these actually work a bit better than the ChapstickTM️ I was scraping the bottom of.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pack of five as a trial run. I kept the mango and pomegranate scented lip balms, gave the vanilla one to my sister, the peppermint to my mom, and the green tea to my boyfriend. We are all obsessed! This lip balm is full of natural ingredients, smells amazing, and moisturizes your lips so well. Initially, I used Carmex (but this dried out my lips SO much), then, I tried Burtz bees (which was great), but these lip balms are SO much better. I am so happy with this product and can't wait to keep purchasing and using!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money, strong mint flavor smell
customer_reviews.text: The only type of Chapstick I like is mint flavored. I have a hard time finding mint at the store so I ordered these on Amazon after looking at several different options. The mint flavor and smell is very strong, at first it made my eyes burn a little. But the flavor and the quality of these chapsticks are great
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: They do soften the lips. Of course you have to keep re-applying. The only fragrance of the 4 that my daughter and I did not care for was the Vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Teresita

customer_reviews.title: They are a perfect size. I kept one for myself (the frost ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to make little gift bags for a reunion. They are a perfect size. I kept one for myself (the frost one) and the lip balm feels so amazingly light on my lips and the scent is light, too. I am very happy with it (and they look simple and cute).
customer_reviews.author: Petra Holt

customer_reviews.title: EH?
customer_reviews.text: They're just okay. I have yet to use all the sticks as I've just received these a few weeks ago. The main complaint I have is that they're not long-lasting!! I find myself having to reapply every 20 mins. or so. My suggestion is stick with BURT'S BEES chapsticks...bit pricey, but worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Kang

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! Love this chapstick. Don’t notice a HUGE different in my lips yet but if I’m gonna be globbing chapstick on my lips in this dry weather anyway it might as well feel good, smell good, and be all natural ingredients. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anytime. Long wearing emollient. That's per my wife & she's picky!
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Really good lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: We are addicted to lip balms and chapstick around here. We really liked the lip balm. It stayed on and has a mild scent. Very good product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Windyflying

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips, great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, my lips feel soft and moisturized, used to buy EOS soft mint before this, I prefer this and it’s better value! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Lagunatracey

customer_reviews.title: This balm is Minty Magic :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My husband found this for me as I use lip balm constantly and complained about my lips being dry despite using balm all the time. We were both impressed this is all natural, feels really minty, and doesnt have a strong scent. I've bought 3 packages of this and will be a lifetime user. Thanks for creating such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These balms are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These balms are awesome!!!! They have nice, refreshing scents, and go on very smoothly. The shipping was also surprisingly fast. They are my favorite lip balms, and I would definitely buy them again. I recommend this amazing product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This product is smooth and creamy, glides on nicely, and not at all waxy like some others. I bought the pack for myself and three kids. The pack offered enough so that my kids could have one for home and one for school. My boys especially liked the tea tree flavor. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: All natural Beeswax lip balm is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the All Natural beeswax lip balm as “favors” for a bridal shower I was throwing for my future sister in law. The lip balms were perfect, and all the guests have been raving about how wonderful the product is. Everyone is telling me how amazing they are, how great they smell, and how awesome and moisturizing they are! I’m going to have to order some for myself after hearing so many ladies are enjoying. Thank you so much for an awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are fine overall. The smell and flavor are great but it doesn’t apply that smoothly. I’ll keep and use them but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chapstick, they have all the same ingredients at burts bees just half the price! I dont care for the green tea flavor. I gave 4 instead of 5 stars because there is no sunblock in them. These will be great for the 8 months of winter Mn endures, but I'll need some with sunblock for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, sealed, and perfect for gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for bridal shower gift bags. They arrived sealed and in perfect condition. The product is soft and easily applied, unlike some beeswax products. Great for kids and guys (no color or noticeable fragrance after application).
customer_reviews.author: DH - SWFL

customer_reviews.title: Formula change?
customer_reviews.text: Did the formula change? I have been using this for about a year, but the last two packs have had a plastic-y smell and taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bust
customer_reviews.text: If this is beeswax lip balm, it must the lowest standard of all types. It felt more like the petroleum stuff. This wins an overall no go from me. I give it 2 stars for trying.
customer_reviews.author: Vcm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the lip balm went on smoothly and how much better my lips felt. I also like the way it stays on my lips longer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 pieces price reasonable but not enough moisture
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for 5 to 10 lip balm pack with price reasonable. I need several lip balms at different places: bathroom, bedroom, purse, work desk and my desk computer because I have bad dry lip. Moisturizing is not enough. I keep applying lip balm on my lip every 30 minutes to 1 hour. Maybe Naturistick lip balm is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Alvarez Orrbon

customer_reviews.title: Great lip balm
customer_reviews.text: Never tried it before so I was worried, but it is awesome. I also like burt's bees and this compares to that.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Effective and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son asks for only this brand. We order a multi pack each time. He swears by this stuff. (No more Burt's Bees....it started giving him a rash!)
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for so long for a great natural lip balm, look no further this is the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips, glides so smoothly, & wonderful scent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple, natural and informative box they come in but the lip balm itself is amazing!!!!!! I love that it’s soft and glides on easily and doesn’t leave my lips feeling like there’s a thick coat of wax on them. The peppermint frost is by far my favorite. Made in the USA too! Thank you so much for your product. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lib balm
customer_reviews.text: Trying the Mango Mist and I love the way it smells, I have very dry lips even in the summer and I think its very moisturizing, I always had to re apply my other chapstick often, this so far maybe the most throughout the whole day 4Xs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The only chap-stick I will buy
customer_reviews.text: it really works! Keeps lips soft and smooth. It is the only chapstick we use in out household. My mother and 2 sisters now only use this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnie H

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the best product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a gift. She had me try it and the next thing you know I stole one from her! The product feels like silk on your lips. The flavors are delicate and tantalizing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love my new chapsticks. My sons have raided them already. They are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great Chapstick I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I use chapstick all the time. I wanted to try a more "natural" chapstick (my former favorite had sunscreen protection). Although this does not, I don't feel I need that type of protection all the time and am more comfortable with the natural ingredients that Naturistick offers. AND it works great! Long lasting, feels awesome on the lips. I tried the green tea which is nice (mild flavor) but want to try the mint next time. As a full time chapstick user I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: VonFlow

customer_reviews.title: Naturistick Lip Balms
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with the purchase. Been an EOS user since it came out of the market and I feel the quality is comparable. Price/oz or per stick is significantly cheaper that the EOS. EOS is just a tad smaller, but larger & bulkier packaging. Product arrived promptly. Will reorder so long as the price remains competitive to that of Costco's bulk price. Definitely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for us.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the family. We all had some kind of reaction. Not sure if it was something in it or the quality.
customer_reviews.author: My ARTasticSelfTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm that I have ever tried. I suffer from extremely chapped lips in certain seasons. It smells good, glides on smoothly, and stays on. My lips have never looked and felt better. I'm glad that I got the 8 pack because I have been sharing with friends and family how good the product is, and sharing my supply.
customer_reviews.author: L. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I like these lip balms very much. I'm kind of old school, liking a thicker yet still easy to apply lip balm product. Works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter as she had looked in various places for it and was pleased from using it in the past ... she was very happy with it and we will likely order it again when the need arises rather than search for it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Will never go back
customer_reviews.text: My best friend introduced me to this product and I have been sold ever since. I prefer all natural products and this product definitely delivers. It keeps my lips moisturized and smells really good! I will continue to buy and support this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eva M.

customer_reviews.title: Great lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband so he wouldn't steal my carmex and lose it. These are perfect. He didn't like one flavor, the mint, so I use it. I absolutely love the feeling. Will definitely buy a set for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Schwalm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have chapped lips like nobody's business, but these really help immediately. The smell is pleasant and not too overwhelming, and the taste is... well, normal. I don't want to pick it up and eat it, but it doesn't taste bad at all either.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Good product. 8 of us liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as part of a stocking stuffer for my 5+2children. We love Burt's Bees, but I just can't afford it any longer! These are natural, moisturizing, and pleasant. The kids really liked them! I would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chapsticks. I was looking for something comparable to Burt's Bees. I tried these and everyone got them in their stocking this year. Everyone loves them. I got a huge box full so once we run out I will be ordering more! Havent went back to burt's bees. Unlike the burt's bees peppermint----- which I dont like, these ones dont burn my lips!
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Favor
customer_reviews.text: Love these chappies! They made the perfect favor for my sister's baby shower. Since they're made of beeswax we made a sign that said "thanks for bee-in here!" Such a cute, useful favor. We wish there were leftovers!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: You need these
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I feel good about supporting a cruelty free company and they make my lips feel great. I really like the scents they have. Overall very happy I bought these and I’ll be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jenna larbig

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chapstick, with living a life with dry and sensitive skin, it has always been a struggle to find a good chapstick to use. When using other products I found that my lips were still chapped no matter how much I used them. With this chapstick, my lips feel smooth and moisturized. I was a little leery about purchasing chapstick online, but I am so incredibly happy I did! I highly recommend this product for anyone, the scent is light and the product goes on smoothly leaving lips feeling refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Levang

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing & doesn't irritate lips
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant flavor and my lips stay moist. More importantly, I have sensitive skin, including lips, and this lip balm doesn't cause me to break out or have an unpleasant dry feeling like other "natural" lip balms.
customer_reviews.author: soylaiv

customer_reviews.title: Great for Anybody
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for friends and they loved it! They loved the smell and flavor. They used it so much and in their words, great for chapped lips. It heals and softens lips and has great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Emelito Salvador

customer_reviews.title: smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! The pomegranate one made me sick but that's because it reminded me of cherry medicine so it's probably just a personal thing. Obsessed with the vanilla and green tea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the selection and they came packed in this awesome little brown box. The scents are great and they are very moisturizing. I will only buy this lip balm from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's stocking stuffer because he loves this stuff. it's very fortifying for the lips and it tastes good too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Yeates

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: These lip balms are great! They go in smooth and stay on. Each one smells so good! The green tea is my favorite, and my husband loves the pomegranate passion.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does not feel greasy and leaves your lips moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Bought as stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to divide them as stocking stuffers with my friends. So i cannot comment on quality but im sure they’re good seeing how they have fairly good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: The_Rox

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Balm!
customer_reviews.text: Best priced lip balm on Amazon for the quality! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Ok, for the value
customer_reviews.text: This could just be preference, but they remind me of Chapstick, when what I was hoping for was more Blistex in consistency/moisturizing. I felt the scents/flavors were more subtle than I'd hoped. Still, ok for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gifts for the season.
customer_reviews.text: Using these as party favors for my kid’s birthday. Glad I went with this product. Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: TD

product_meta.title: 16-Pack Lip Balm Gift Set by Naturistick. Assorted Flavors. 100% Natural Ingredients. Best Beeswax Chapsticks for Dry, Chapped Lips. Made in USA for Men, Women and Children
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Variety| Size:16 Count (Pack of 1)

 Restore Your Lips with 100% Natural Lip Care by Naturistick and Bring Your Beautiful Smile Back

• Made of 100% Natural Premium Beeswax with no harsh ingredients or artificial additives.
• Harmoniously balanced, naturally soothing and refreshing, never overpowering.
• Perfect for soothing and healing dry, chapped, or damaged lips.
• Gentle on ultra-sensitive lips. Suitable for men, women, and children of all ages.
• Packaged with minimal impact on the environment. Never tested on animals.




Thousands of Amazon customers trust Naturistick Lip Balms for the wellbeing of their lips. We invite you to try it for yourself.



What’s in the Box:

Peppermint Frost, Pomegranate Passion, Vanilla Luxury, Mango Mist, and Green Tea Essence (3 each).

1 Bonus Peppermint stick in classic black tube.

100% Natural Ingredients:

 Beeswax, Sunflower Seed Oil, Coconut Oil, Castor Seed Oil, Lanolin, Natural Flavors, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera Leaf Extract, Cocoa Seed Butter, Rosemary Leaf Oil, Shea Butter.

Share the Gift …

 Naturistick Lip Balms make for perfect gifts and stocking stuffers – any time, any occasion. Watch faces glow when you share!

Try It Risk on Us!

 We believe Naturistick Premium Beeswax Lip Balms are the best money can buy – but don’t take our word for it – TRY IT RISK ON US! If, for any reason the lip balms do not live up to your expectations, simply let us know and we will make it right. Any time. No questions asked.

 Hit the “Add to Cart” button and check us out – you’ll be glad you did!

 Be sure to let us know how you like it – we love to hear from our customers!
feature_bullets: 5 Naturally Soothing Flavors – Peppermint, Pomegranate, Vanilla, Mango, and Green Tea (3 ea +1 Bonus Black Peppermint Stick)
100% Certified Beeswax and Natural Ingredients - No Petroleum, Chemicals, Gluten, or Parabens. Non-GMO
Proprietary Formulation - Gentle on Ultra-sensitive Lips and Safe for Adults and Children of All Ages
Cruelty-Free and Environmentally-Friendly Packaging – Never Tested on Animals
Best Year-Round Lip Protection for the Whole Family. Full Refund or Replacement if Ever Dissatisfied
